resources.string:
Simple Workout Tracker
allows you to view your progress pictures and progress graphs online. This allows you to enjoy your progress with richer, bigger graphs.
It allows you to view your progress pictures all together and it allows you to share this with your friends.
You have three options for getting these reports. Buy, Tweet or Facebook Post. Buy is just $0.99, but if you post or tweet about us you will get it for free. Any of the three options will give you unlimited reports for life. What would you like to do?
The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
This app cannot connect to Market. Your version of Market may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
Edit the developer payload associated with this purchase
To get started click \"Define a new Workout\"
Here you will define your workouts. Choose the type of workout you want to define.

Click on \"See Your Pictures\" to see pictures your have taken. Click on a workout to see your progress in a graph or table. Click and Hold on a workout to change the details or name of a workout. View the \"Table\" to change individual data entries.
This is your workout data as a table. Click and hold on a data entry to edit or delete one.
